item_prototype.name: Instance {#MYSQL_INSTANCE_NAME} - Number of full table scans /s - Expect low value for OLTP
Instance {#MYSQL_INSTANCE_NAME} - Number of rows for all databases
Instance {#MYSQL_INSTANCE_NAME} - Selects /s not using query cache
Instance {#MYSQL_INSTANCE_NAME} - select_full_join /s - Should be 0. If not, it indicates tables are joined with table scan
Instance {#MYSQL_INSTANCE_NAME} - select_range_check /s - Should be 0. If not, it indicates tables are joined with table scan

trigger_prototype.name: MYSQL Instance {#MYSQL_INSTANCE_NAME} - Database {$MYSQL_DATABASE} size over threshold
MYSQL Instance {#MYSQL_INSTANCE_NAME} - Instance datas size over threshold
MYSQL Instance {#MYSQL_INSTANCE_NAME} - Threads number over threshold
trigger_prototype.description: Threads number must be lower than max_connections parameter.
